title: Azir PBE
body:
{{champion:268}}

Azir

    Base Attack Damage is now 52 (up from 49)
    Conquering Sands [Q] - Soldiers now deal 65/85/105/125/145 (down from 75/105/135/165/195)
    Arise! [W] - AP Ratio on turret damage reduced to .4 (down from .6)
    Sand Soldiers Attack Range 400 -> 325

* Remember *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical changes. The changes you see below may be lacking context or other accompanying changes that didn't make it in - don't freak out! These are not official notes.

replies.body: Höre/lese ich jedenfalls nach jedem ARAM, in dem meine Gegner gegen meinen oder einen verbündeteten Azir verloren haben.
